H5712.def: = a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H5512.def: = desert; ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between {L:Sea of Reeds<SDBH:יָם־סוּף>} and {L:Dophkah<SDBH:דָּפְקָה>}; ► the {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2583.def: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

H7508.def: = location ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between {L:Alush<SDBH:אָלוּשׁ>} and wilderness of Sinai; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2522.def: = process by which humans run out of physical strength

H6002.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eliphaz<SDBH:אֱלִיפַז>}; grandson of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ► chief of {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H2146.def: = process by which humans retain knowledge of people from the past, or of things that have happened in the past

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H4229.def: = causative action by which humans clean or dry an object or body part by rubbing it with a cloth or with their hands; sometimes extended to refer to God; ≈ sometimes associated with destruction

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2143.def: = process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly

H6002.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eliphaz<SDBH:אֱלִיפַז>}; grandson of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ► chief of {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5251.def: = a distinctive object in the form of a flag or board attached to a stick, or a metal device or image fitted on the end of a pole; ► normally used to identify a particular group, or as a rallying point for soldiers in war; ≈ often used figuratively to denote an example, or a person or deity that one can rely on, or something that shows the way

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3676.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H3050.def: = short form of {L:יהוה<SDBH:יהוה>}, only found in poetic texts

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H6002.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eliphaz<SDBH:אֱלִיפַז>}; grandson of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ► chief of {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}
